      • viewDiffPanel

        public void viewDiffPanel(javax.swing.JFrame mainFrame)
        Turns visibility of Difficulty panel on or creates it if it doesn't exist.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - JFrame in which this panel is component of.
        Precondition:
        None.
        Postcondition:
        Turns visibility of Difficulty panel on, and turns off everything else.

      • viewGamePanel

        public void viewGamePanel(MainFrame mainFrame,
                          int diff,
                          boolean isMonoChrome)
        Creates Game panel with specific options.
        Parameters:
        mainFrame - JFrame in which this panel is component of.
        diff - The level of game difficulty; 1 = easy, 2 = normal, 3 = hard.
        isMonoChrome - True if it is a Monochrome game, false otherwise.
        Precondition:
        None.
        Postcondition:
        Creates a Game panel, and turns visibility of everything else off.
